result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Malik Isiah Jones

records.addlTxt:
11:20 AM Defendant Malik Isiah Jones appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Paul J Augustyn in court for Malik Isiah Jones. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 22CF55, 22CF112 & 22CF204. Schiek states there is not an agreement at this time - would like 22CF204 set for a 3 day jury trial - has complied with victim rights. Augustyn in agreement. Bond continued. adj. 11:25 PM
Jury trial scheduled for February 1, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 11, 2023 at 10:00 am.

10:59 AM Defendant Malik Isiah Jones appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Paul J Augustyn in court for Malik Isiah Jones. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 22CF204, 22CF112 & 22CF55. 22CF204 set for a preliminary hearing. State calls Oneida County Sheriff's Detective Sergeant Chad Wanta/sworn/direct by Schiek/Witness identifies Defendant/continued direct by Schiek/cross by Augustyn/witness is excused. Court finds probable cause exists and binds Defendant over. Schiek states Information will be filed that mirrors Complaint. Augustyn willing to proceed to Arraignment today; waives further reading and enters not guilty pleas. Bond continued. adj. 11:27 AM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:01 AM Defendant Malik Isiah Jones appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Paul J Augustyn appearing by video for Malik Isiah Jones. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 22CF55, 22CF112 & 22CF204. 22CF207 set for and Adjourned Initial Appearance. In receipt of complaint, waive reading - set for preliminary hearing. Schiek has complied with victim rights. Augustyn/Schiek statement to bond. Defendant states father lives in Green Bay - states is homeless. Court statement to bond - continues bond. adj. 11:12 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:47 AM Defendant Malik Isiah Jones appeared by video. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Paul J. Augustyn appearing in court. Augustyn represents Defendant on other cases would take a pubic defender appointment on this case. Court will set out. Bond Continued. adj. 10:50 AM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report

01:19 PM Judge Mary Burns mentoring with Judge Gregory Grau. Defendant Malik Isiah Jones appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Michael William Schiek in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states has been trying to reach Attorney Augustyn - PDs office has not appointed counsel. Court directs to reach out to PD's office. Defendant statement to bond. Court statement to bond. Schiek statement to bond. Court continues bond. adj. 01:26 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Noified Scott, ONSO - Court quashes warrant/never sent over
No contact with co-defendant, Jasmine Lariviere

1:59 PM Judge Mary Burns mentoring with Judge Neal Nielsen. Defendant Malik Isiah Jones appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael William Schiek in court for State of Wisconsin. Schiek notes victim appears by phone. Attorney Breanna Magallones notes public defender conflict. Their office is reaching out to Atty. Augustyn who was appointed in defendant's prior cases. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Schiek statement to bail and references other pending cases. Court quashes warrant. Court sets bond. adj.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
